Message:
I try to leave the tent quietly,
but the dazzling light from the
spotlight stops me in my tracks.

Oh, come on...
Here I thought I’d leave
without you all knowing.
I really can’t hide things
from you guys, huh...?
Hehehe.

“The world’s greatest gunslinger,
Cordie! In celebration of your
departure, let the circus...begin!”

The tent erupts with festivities
that are in no way befitting
of a farewell.

I hate to do this, but...
there’s no way I can stay
till the end of the show.
If I do, I’m sure I won’t
want to leave anymore.

Leaving my tears as they are,
I make my way out of the tent
one stride at a time.

The lively voices of everyone
illuminating my way.

In hopes of one day
returning to shine
under the dazzling
spotlight once more.
